com.scriptrts.game
Class MapGrid

java.lang.Object
  com.scriptrts.game.MapGrid

public class MapGrid
extends java.lang.Object

Stores the locations of all the units on the map.

Field Summary

          How many of the smallest unit can fit along one side of each map tile

spaceTakenFor

public boolean spaceTakenFor(int i,
                             int j,
                             GameObject unit)
Check whether the given unit can move to the specified spot.

Parameters:
i - x coordinate of spot
j - y coordinate of spot
unit - the unit for which to check. If this is null, then it checks whether this spot is taken for any unit.
